cost_functions.name: max_err_map_a_b
cost_functions.definition: abs( d_a_b - d_b_ex) ./ max( abs( d_b_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_map_a_c
cost_functions.definition: abs( d_a_c - d_c_ex) ./ max( abs( d_c_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_map_b_a
cost_functions.definition: abs( d_b_a - d_a_ex) ./ max( abs( d_a_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_map_b_c
cost_functions.definition: abs( d_b_c - d_c_ex) ./ max( abs( d_c_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_map_c_a
cost_functions.definition: abs( d_c_a - d_a_ex) ./ max( abs( d_a_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_map_c_b
cost_functions.definition: abs( d_c_b - d_b_ex) ./ max( abs( d_b_ex))
